title: WTB: Piedmont or Sweet Caporal Cigarette Pack
author: JJ McGraw

posts.post_title: WTB: Piedmont or Sweet Caporal Cigarette Pack
posts.post_content: Looking for a 1909-1910 Piedmont Cigarette pack, marked The American Tobacco co. Doesn’t have to be pristine, just presentable for display. Also, would love to find a Sweet Caporal pack as well.
Sent PM back at you with my email for the pictures
